title: Meters-based running stats (distance/speed/heatmaps) gated on BEV
scope: Compute distance and speed from pitch-frame tracks when BEV gating passes.
Compute basic heatmaps from pitch positions.
When BEV is gated-off, omit meters-based stats and explain why in the report.
acceptance: report.json includes distance/speed aggregates when BEV is gated-on.
Heatmap artifacts are produced (or embedded) deterministically when gated-on.
When gated-off, stats are withheld and the report explains gating reasons.

deliverables.title: Stats computation module
acceptance: Stats are computed from pitch-frame tracks only when BEV is enabled.
Outputs are deterministic and include confidence notes.

subtasks.title: Implement gated meters-based stats and report integration.
done_when: stats/metrics.py computes distance/speed and basic heatmaps deterministically.
report.json includes stats only when BEV is gated-on.
